General.Name: Foxconn Industrial Internet Co Ltd
General.Description: Foxconn Industrial Internet Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures communication network and cloud service equipment, precision tools, industrial robots. The company offers communication and mobile network equipment comprising of terminals, modules, private network, Wi-Fi equipment, and optical communication products. It also offers computing products, such as server, cooling valve, storage device, and edge computing accessories. In addition, the company provides manufacturing consulting, cloud, and platform services; and hardware and software integration products. Further, it offers automobile and parts, electronic manufacturing, precision metal, household, and machining industry solutions. The company serves brand service, telecom operators, and cable tv operators, enterprises, cloud service providers, internet service providers, software, and hardware solutions. Foxconn Industrial Internet Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Shenzhen, China. The company is a subsidiary of Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Ltd.
General.Address: C1, Foxconn Technology Park, Shenzhen, China
